You know every shadow is a gateway to the Netherworld, and like an artist molding clay, you form that realm's shadowy substance into terrible and wondrous shapes at your whim. Your ability to control shadows might mean a dark passenger guides you.

Harmony When you @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.y9tYChycW6xcdT7J], the target's shadow darkens and swells, reducing bright light within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] of the target to dim light. This is a form of magical darkness and can overcome non-magical light sources or attempts to counteract magical light. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] while in this dim light, and can use the concealed condition to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]. This lasts until the end of your next turn. Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness and they treat targets seen through the darkness as concealed.

Perfect Harmony You gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.Px0wiqFEiQdPLvou] action. Whenever you @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.y9tYChycW6xcdT7J], the healed creature can use this action once before the end of their next turn.
